params.sqlcmd: "select " +" T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"OUTPUT_RSLT_CD\\" as \\"OUTPUT_RSLT_CD\\", " +" T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"WS_CD\\" as \\"WS_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"ACPT_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"ACPT_QTY\\", " +" to_char(T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"OPR_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"OPR_DATE\\", " +" T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"WH_CD\\" as \\"WH_CD\\", " +" T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"OUTPUT_RSLT_COMMENT\\" as \\"OUTPUT_RSLT_COMMENT\\", " +" T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"LOT_NO\\" as \\"LOT_NO\\", " +" T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"VEND_LOT_NO\\" as \\"VEND_LOT_NO\\", " +" to_char(T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"DEFECT_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"DEFECT_QTY\\", " +" T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"DEFECT_CAUSE_CD\\" as \\"DEFECT_CAUSE_CD\\", " +" T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"DEFECT_COMMENT\\" as \\"DEFECT_COMMENT\\", " +" T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"OUTPUT_RSLT_PERSON\\" as \\"OUTPUT_RSLT_PERSON\\", " +" T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"OPR_TIME_UNIT_TYP\\" as \\"OPR_TIME_UNIT_TYP\\", " +" to_char(T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"PRE_ARRANGEMENT_TIME\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"PRE_ARRANGEMENT_TIME\\", " +" to_char(T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"OPR_TIME\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"OPR_TIME\\", " +" to_char(T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"POST_ARRANGEMENT_TIME\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"POST_ARRANGEMENT_TIME\\", " +" to_char(T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"CESSATION_TIME\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"CESSATION_TIME\\", " +" T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"CESSATION_CAUSE\\" as \\"CESSATION_CAUSE\\", " +" T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"DRAW_CD\\" as \\"DRAW_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPEC\\" as \\"SPEC\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\" as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.STOCK_UNIT as STOCK_UNIT, " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"LOT_NUMBERING_TYP\\") AS \\"LOT_NUMBERING_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"LOT_CTRL_FLG\\") AS \\"LOT_CTRL_FLG\\", " +" M_WS.\\"WS_NAME\\" as \\"WS_NAME\\", " +" M_WH.\\"WH_NAME\\" as \\"WH_NAME\\", " +" T_OPR_RSLT.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" as \\"OPR_INST_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" as \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\" " +"from " +" T_OUTPUT_RSLT, " +" M_ITEM, " +" M_WS, " +" M_WH, " +" T_OPR_RSLT, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"where " +" T_OUTPUT_RSLT.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD " +" and T_OUTPUT_RSLT.WS_CD = M_WS.WS_CD " +" and T_OUTPUT_RSLT.WH_CD = M_WH.WH_CD " +" and T_OUTPUT_RSLT.OUTPUT_RSLT_CD = T_OPR_RSLT.OUTPUT_RSLT_CD " +" and T_OPR_RSLT.OPR_INST_CD = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.OPR_INST_CD " +" and T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"OUTPUT_RSLT_CD\\" = ? " +"order by " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd')"

"SELECT " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\" AS \\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\", " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_TYP\\") AS \\"ISSUE_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_INST_UNIT_DENOMINATOR\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') AS \\"ISSUE_INST_UNIT_DENOMINATOR\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_INST_UNIT_NUMERATOR\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') AS \\"ISSUE_INST_UNIT_NUMERATOR\\", " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" AS \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"WH_CD\\" AS \\"WH_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.LOT_CTRL_FLG) AS LOT_CTRL_FLG, " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" AS \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", 'FM0') AS \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" M_WH.\\"WH_NAME\\" AS \\"WH_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\" AS \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" LOT_USE_RSLT.LOT_NO, " +" TO_CHAR(NVL(LOT_USE_RSLT.TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY, 0), 'FM999999999999999990.0999') AS TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY, " +" TO_CHAR(NVL(LOT_USE_RSLT.SUPPLIED_ISSUE_QTY, 0), 'FM999999999999999990.0999') AS SUPPLIED_ISSUE_QTY " +"FROM " +" M_ITEM, " +" M_WH, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT.LOT_NO, " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT.ITEM_CD, " +" SUM(T_LOT_USE_RSLT.TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY) AS TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY, " +" SUM(T_LOT_USE_RSLT.SUPPLIED_ISSUE_QTY) AS SUPPLIED_ISSUE_QTY " +" FROM " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT " +" WHERE " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT.WORK_ODR_CD = ? " +" GROUP BY " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT.LOT_NO, " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT.ITEM_CD " +" ) LOT_USE_RSLT, " +" T_ISSUE_INST " +"WHERE " +" T_ISSUE_INST.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD " +" AND T_ISSUE_INST.WH_CD = M_WH.WH_CD " +" AND T_ISSUE_INST.ITEM_CD = LOT_USE_RSLT.ITEM_CD(+) " +" AND T_ISSUE_INST.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_TYP\\" IN ('1', '2') " +"ORDER BY " +" T_ISSUE_INST.ISSUE_INST_CD, " +" LOT_USE_RSLT.LOT_NO"
"select " +" to_char(SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\" " +"from " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL " +"where " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" to_char(count(*)) as count_RCV_ISSUE, " +" to_char(nvl(sum(RCV_ISSUE_QTY), 0), 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"RCV_ISSUE_QTY\\", " +" to_char(nvl(sum(RCV_ISSUE_ODD_QTY), 0), 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"RCV_ISSUE_ODD_QTY\\" " +"from " +" T_RCV_ISSUE " +"where " +" WORK_ODR_CD = ? " +" and(RCV_ISSUE_GNR_TYP = 51 " +" or RCV_ISSUE_GNR_TYP = 59) " +" and T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_RCV_ISSUE.ISSUE_INST_CD = ?"
"select " +" WH_CD, " +" WH_NAME, " +" PLANT_CD " +"from " +" M_WH " +"where " +" WH_CD = ?"

"select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"DRAW_CD\\" as \\"DRAW_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPEC\\" as \\"SPEC\\", " +" M_ITEM.STOCK_UNIT as STOCK_UNIT, " +" to_char(M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\") as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" to_char(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\") as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"LOT_NUMBERING_TYP\\") AS \\"LOT_NUMBERING_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"LOT_CTRL_FLG\\") AS \\"LOT_CTRL_FLG\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" to_char(T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\" " +"from " +" T_ITEM_STOCK " +"where " +" T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +"for update nowait"
"select " +" WS_CD, " +" WS_NAME, " +" PLANT_CD " +"from " +" M_WS " +"where " +" WS_CD = ?"

"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" as \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_STS_TYP\\" as \\"WORK_STS_TYP\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" as \\"OPR_INST_CD\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\" = '1' " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_STS_TYP\\" >= '2' " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +"order by " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_STS_TYP\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\""

"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" as \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_STS_TYP\\" as \\"WORK_STS_TYP\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" as \\"OPR_INST_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\" = 1 " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_STS_TYP\\" = 2 " +"order by " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\" " +"for update nowait"

"select " +" to_char(sum(T_OPR_RSLT.\\"ACPT_QTY\\" + T_OPR_RSLT.\\"DEFECT_QTY\\"), 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"SUM_OPR_RSLT_QTY\\" " +"from " +" T_OPR_RSLT " +"group by " +" T_OPR_RSLT.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" " +"having " +" T_OPR_RSLT.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" as \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" as \\"OPR_INST_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\" = 1 " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_STS_TYP\\" = 9 " +"order by " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\" desc " +"for update nowait"

"insert into " +" T_OPR_RSLT(\\"OPR_INST_CD\\", \\"PARTIAL_PRD_NO\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"ACPT_QTY\\", \\"DEFECT_QTY\\", \\"OPR_DATE\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\", \\"WH_CD\\", \\"WS_CD\\", \\"OPR_RSLT_PERSON\\", \\"OPR_RSLT_COMMENT\\", \\"OPR_TIME_UNIT_TYP\\", \\"PRE_ARRANGEMENT_TIME\\", \\"POST_ARRANGEMENT_TIME\\", \\"OPR_TIME\\", \\"CESSATION_TIME\\", \\"CESSATION_CAUSE\\", \\"OUTPUT_RSLT_CD\\", \\"LOT_NO\\", \\"VEND_LOT_NO\\", \\"OPR_CRCT_NO\\") " +"values " +" (?, to_number(?), ?, to_number(?), to_number(?), to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'), ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, to_number(?), to_number(?), to_number(?), to_number(?), to_number(?), ?, ?, ?,?, to_number(?))"
"update " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"set " +" \\"WORK_STS_TYP\\" = ?, " +" \\"WORK_CMPLT_DATE\\" = to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd') " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(PARTIAL_PRD_NO), 0) + 1) as MAX_PRD_NO " +"from " +" T_OPR_RSLT " +"where " +" OPR_INST_CD = ?"

"insert into " +" T_RCV_ISSUE(\\"RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_TYP\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\", \\"WH_CD\\", \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", \\"JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\", \\"ACPT_NO\\", \\"ACPT_RSLT_CRCT_NO\\", \\"INSPEC_RSLT_CRCT_NO\\", \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\", \\"PARTIAL_PRD_NO\\", \\"OPR_RSLT_CRCT_NO\\", \\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_BEFORE_QTY\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_QTY\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_AFTER_QTY\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_AMOUNT\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_DATE\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_GNR_TYP\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_ODD_QTY\\", \\"DEFECT_CAUSE_CD\\", \\"STOCK_UPD_TYP\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_CMPLT_FLG\\", \\"OD_NO\\", \\"LOT_NO\\", \\"VEND_LOT_NO\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_COMMENT\\", \\"CONS_TYP\\", \\"COMPANY_CD\\") " +"values " +" (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, to_number(?), ?, to_number(?), to_number(?), to_number(?), ?, ?, to_number(?), to_number(?), ?, to_number(?), to_number(?), to_number(?) + to_number(?), to_number(?), to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_number(?), to_number(?), ?, to_number(?), to_number(?), ?, ?, ?, ?, to_number(?), ?)"

"insert into " +" T_OUTPUT_RSLT(\\"OUTPUT_RSLT_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"ACPT_QTY\\", \\"DEFECT_QTY\\", \\"DEFECT_CAUSE_CD\\", \\"OPR_DATE\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\", \\"WH_CD\\", \\"WS_CD\\", \\"OUTPUT_RSLT_PERSON\\", \\"OUTPUT_RSLT_COMMENT\\", \\"OPR_TIME_UNIT_TYP\\", \\"PRE_ARRANGEMENT_TIME\\", \\"POST_ARRANGEMENT_TIME\\", \\"OPR_TIME\\", \\"CESSATION_TIME\\", \\"CESSATION_CAUSE\\",\\"LOT_NO\\", \\"VEND_LOT_NO\\", \\"DEFECT_COMMENT\\") " +"values " +" (?, ?, to_number(?), to_number(?), ?, to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd'), ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, to_number(?), to_number(?), to_number(?), to_number(?), to_number(?), ?, ?, ?, ?)"

"update " +" T_OUTPUT_RSLT " +"set " +" \\"ACPT_QTY\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"DEFECT_QTY\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"DEFECT_CAUSE_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"OPR_DATE\\" = to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd'), " +" \\"WH_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"WS_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"OUTPUT_RSLT_PERSON\\" = ?, " +" \\"OUTPUT_RSLT_COMMENT\\" = ?, " +" \\"OPR_TIME_UNIT_TYP\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"PRE_ARRANGEMENT_TIME\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"POST_ARRANGEMENT_TIME\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"OPR_TIME\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"CESSATION_TIME\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"CESSATION_CAUSE\\" = ?, " +" \\"LOT_NO\\" = ?, " +" \\"VEND_LOT_NO\\" = ?, " +" \\"DEFECT_COMMENT\\" = ? " +"where " +" T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"OUTPUT_RSLT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" as \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_STS_TYP\\" as \\"WORK_STS_TYP\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" as \\"OPR_INST_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" T_OPR_RSLT.\\"PARTIAL_PRD_NO\\" as \\"PARTIAL_PRD_NO\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM, " +" T_OPR_RSLT " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_STS_TYP\\" = 9 " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" = T_OPR_RSLT.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" " +" and T_OPR_RSLT.\\"OUTPUT_RSLT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_OPR_RSLT.\\"PARTIAL_PRD_NO\\" = ( " +" select " +" max(T_OPR_RSLT.\\"PARTIAL_PRD_NO\\") " +" from " +" T_OPR_RSLT " +" where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" = T_OPR_RSLT.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" " +" and T_OPR_RSLT.\\"OUTPUT_RSLT_CD\\" = ? " +" ) " +"union all " +"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" as \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_STS_TYP\\" as \\"WORK_STS_TYP\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" as \\"OPR_INST_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" 0 as \\"PARTIAL_PRD_NO\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\" = 1 " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_STS_TYP\\" = 2 " +"order by " +" 5 desc, " +" 3"

"select " +" to_char(sum(T_OPR_RSLT.\\"ACPT_QTY\\" + T_OPR_RSLT.\\"DEFECT_QTY\\"), 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"SUM_OPR_RSLT_QTY\\" " +"from " +" T_OPR_RSLT " +"where " +" T_OPR_RSLT.\\"OUTPUT_RSLT_CD\\" <> ? " +"group by " +" T_OPR_RSLT.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" " +"having " +" T_OPR_RSLT.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" = ?"

"update " +" T_OPR_RSLT " +"set " +" \\"ACPT_QTY\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"DEFECT_QTY\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"OPR_CRCT_NO\\" = to_number(?) " +"where " +" T_OPR_RSLT.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_OPR_RSLT.\\"PARTIAL_PRD_NO\\" = ? " +" and T_OPR_RSLT.\\"OUTPUT_RSLT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_OPR_RSLT.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" as \\"OPR_INST_CD\\", " +" T_OPR_RSLT.\\"PARTIAL_PRD_NO\\" as \\"PARTIAL_PRD_NO\\", " +" T_OPR_RSLT.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_OPR_RSLT " +"where " +" T_OPR_RSLT.\\"OUTPUT_RSLT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_OPR_RSLT.\\"OPR_CRCT_NO\\" = 0 " +"order by " +" T_OPR_RSLT.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\", " +" T_OPR_RSLT.\\"PARTIAL_PRD_NO\\""

"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" as \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_STS_TYP\\" as \\"WORK_STS_TYP\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" = ? " +"for update nowait"
"insert into " +" T_ITEM_STOCK(\\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"WH_CD\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\", \\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\") " +"values " +" (?, ?, ?, to_number(?))"
"update " +" T_ITEM_STOCK " +"set " +" \\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\" = to_number(?) " +"where " +" T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"WH_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" to_char(T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_OUTPUT_RSLT " +"where " +" T_OUTPUT_RSLT.\\"OUTPUT_RSLT_CD\\" = ? " +"for update nowait"

"SELECT " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\" AS \\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\", " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_TYP\\") AS \\"ISSUE_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_INST_UNIT_DENOMINATOR\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') AS \\"ISSUE_INST_UNIT_DENOMINATOR\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_INST_UNIT_NUMERATOR\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') AS \\"ISSUE_INST_UNIT_NUMERATOR\\", " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" AS \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"WH_CD\\" AS \\"WH_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.LOT_CTRL_FLG) AS LOT_CTRL_FLG, " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" AS \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", 'FM0') AS \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" M_WH.\\"WH_NAME\\" AS \\"WH_NAME\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\") AS \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" AS \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" LOT_USE_RSLT.LOT_NO, " +" TO_CHAR(NVL(LOT_USE_RSLT.TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY, 0), 'FM999999999999999990.0999') AS TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY, " +" TO_CHAR(NVL(LOT_USE_RSLT.SUPPLIED_ISSUE_QTY, 0), 'FM999999999999999990.0999') AS SUPPLIED_ISSUE_QTY " +"FROM " +" M_ITEM, " +" M_WH, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT.LOT_NO, " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT.ITEM_CD, " +" SUM(T_LOT_USE_RSLT.TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY) AS TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY, " +" SUM(T_LOT_USE_RSLT.SUPPLIED_ISSUE_QTY) AS SUPPLIED_ISSUE_QTY " +" FROM " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT " +" WHERE " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT.WORK_ODR_CD = ? " +" AND T_LOT_USE_RSLT.LOT_NO = ? " +" GROUP BY " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT.LOT_NO, " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT.ITEM_CD " +" ) LOT_USE_RSLT, " +" T_ISSUE_INST " +"WHERE " +" T_ISSUE_INST.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD " +" AND T_ISSUE_INST.WH_CD = M_WH.WH_CD " +" AND T_ISSUE_INST.ITEM_CD = LOT_USE_RSLT.ITEM_CD(+) " +" AND T_ISSUE_INST.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_TYP\\" IN ('1', '2')"
"select " +" max(to_char(T_OPR_RSLT.\\"OPR_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd')) as \\"MAX_OPR_DATE\\" " +"from " +" T_OPR_RSLT " +"where " +" T_OPR_RSLT.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" = ?"
"SELECT " +" VALUE " +"FROM " +" SYS_PARAMETER " +"WHERE " +" NAME = 'PAST_RESULT_ENTRY_TYP'"
"SELECT " +" PROC_EXEC_DATE " +"FROM " +" SYS_ACTUAL_COST_CTRL_AC " +"WHERE " +" PLANT_CD = ?"

"SELECT " +" TO_CHAR(T_LOT_CTRL.BEST_BEFORE_DATE + PARAM.VALUE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS BEST_BEFORE_DATE " +"FROM " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" VALUE " +" FROM " +" SYS_PARAMETER " +" WHERE " +" NAME = 'BEST_BEFORE_DATA_PARA' " +" ) PARAM, " +" T_LOT_CTRL " +"WHERE " +" T_LOT_CTRL.LOT_NO = ? " +" AND T_LOT_CTRL.ITEM_CD = ?"
"UPDATE " +" T_LOT_CTRL " +"SET " +" \\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0 " +"WHERE " +" T_LOT_CTRL.\\"LOT_NO\\" = ? " +" AND T_LOT_CTRL.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"INSERT INTO " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT(\\"RSLT_CTL_SEQ_NO\\", \\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\", \\"LOT_NO\\", \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", \\"PARTIAL_PRD_NO\\", \\"WS_CD\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\", \\"ACPT_NO\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"WH_CD\\", \\"TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY\\", \\"SUPPLIED_ISSUE_QTY\\", \\"PART_SUPPLIED_COMMENT\\", \\"SUPPLIED_DATE\\") " +"VALUES " +" (TO_NUMBER(?), ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), ?, TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'))"

"SELECT " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT.\\"LOT_NO\\" AS \\"LOT_NO\\", " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT.\\"ITEM_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_LOT_USE_RSLT.\\"TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') AS \\"TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_LOT_USE_RSLT.\\"SUPPLIED_ISSUE_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') AS \\"SUPPLIED_ISSUE_QTY\\" " +"FROM " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT " +"WHERE " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_LOT_USE_RSLT.\\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_LOT_USE_RSLT.\\"LOT_NO\\" = ?"

"UPDATE " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT " +"SET " +" \\"TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY\\" = to_number(?), " +" \\"SUPPLIED_DATE\\" = to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd') " +"WHERE " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT.\\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_LOT_USE_RSLT.\\"LOT_NO\\" = ? " +" AND T_LOT_USE_RSLT.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_LOT_USE_RSLT.\\"PARTIAL_PRD_NO\\" = to_number(?)"

"SELECT " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\", " +" T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.\\"LOT_NO\\" AS \\"LOT_NO\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') AS \\"ISSUE_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS \\"ISSUE_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.\\"SPENT_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') AS \\"SPENT_QTY\\" " +"FROM " +" T_LOT_CTRL, " +" T_LOT_ISSUE_INST, " +" T_ISSUE_INST, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM, " +" T_OPR_RSLT " +"WHERE " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_STS_TYP\\" IN (2, 9) " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" = T_OPR_RSLT.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" " +" AND T_OPR_RSLT.\\"OUTPUT_RSLT_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_OPR_RSLT.\\"PARTIAL_PRD_NO\\" = ( " +" SELECT " +" MAX(T_OPR_RSLT.\\"PARTIAL_PRD_NO\\") " +" FROM " +" T_OPR_RSLT " +" WHERE " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" = T_OPR_RSLT.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" " +" AND T_OPR_RSLT.\\"OUTPUT_RSLT_CD\\" = ? " +" ) " +" AND T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = T_ISSUE_INST.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" " +" AND T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_TYP\\" IN ('1', '2') " +" AND T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.ITEM_CD = T_LOT_CTRL.ITEM_CD " +" AND T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.LOT_NO = T_LOT_CTRL.LOT_NO " +" AND T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\" = T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\" " +" AND T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" " +" AND T_ISSUE_INST.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" " +" AND T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.\\"LOT_NO\\" = ? " +"ORDER BY " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" T_OPR_RSLT.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\", " +" T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\", " +" T_LOT_CTRL.BEST_BEFORE_DATE, " +" T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.LOT_NO"

"UPDATE " +" T_LOT_ISSUE_INST " +"SET " +" \\"SPENT_QTY\\" = TO_NUMBER(?) " +"WHERE " +" T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.\\"LOT_NO\\" = ? " +" AND T_LOT_ISSUE_INST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"
"SELECT " +" TO_CHAR(SEQ_JF_RSLT.NEXTVAL, 'FM0000000000') " +"FROM " +" DUAL"

"SELECT " +" TO_CHAR(T_LOT_STOCK.\\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') AS \\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_LOT_STOCK.\\"ALCD_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') AS \\"ALCD_QTY\\" " +"FROM " +" T_LOT_STOCK " +"WHERE " +" T_LOT_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_LOT_STOCK.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_LOT_STOCK.\\"LOT_NO\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" M_PS.\\"PARENT_ITEM_CD\\" AS \\"PARENT_ITEM_CD\\" " +"FROM " +" M_PS " +"WHERE " +" M_PS.\\"COMP_ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +"START WITH " +" M_PS.\\"PARENT_ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND M_PS.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\" <= TO_DATE( ? , 'yyyy/mm/dd' ) " +" AND M_PS.\\"EFF_PHASE_OUT_DATE\\" >= TO_DATE( ? , 'yyyy/mm/dd' ) " +"CONNECT BY " +" M_PS.\\"PARENT_ITEM_CD\\" = PRIOR M_PS.\\"COMP_ITEM_CD\\" " +" AND M_PS.\\"PARENT_ITEM_CD\\" <> M_PS.\\"COMP_ITEM_CD\\" " +" AND M_PS.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\" <= TO_DATE( ? , 'yyyy/mm/dd' ) " +" AND M_PS.\\"EFF_PHASE_OUT_DATE\\" >= TO_DATE( ? , 'yyyy/mm/dd' )"
"SELECT " +" SYS_PARAMETER.\\"VALUE\\" AS \\"VALUE\\" " +"FROM " +" SYS_PARAMETER " +"WHERE " +" SYS_PARAMETER.\\"NAME\\" = 'BEST_BEFORE_DATE_CHECK_FLG'"

"SELECT " +" NVL(CASE WHEN TO_DATE(?,'YYYY/MM/DD') > T_LOT_CTRL.\\"BEST_BEFORE_DATE\\" " +" THEN '1' ELSE '0' END, 0) BBD_C_FLG " +"FROM " +" T_LOT_CTRL, " +" M_ITEM " +"WHERE " +" M_ITEM.ITEM_CD = T_LOT_CTRL.ITEM_CD " +" AND T_LOT_CTRL.\\"LOT_NO\\" = ? " +" AND T_LOT_CTRL.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" LOT_USE.RSLT_CTL_SEQ_NO, " +" ISSUE_INST.ISSUE_INST_UNIT_DENOMINATOR, " +" ISSUE_INST.ISSUE_INST_UNIT_NUMERATOR, " +" ITEM.UNIT_QTY_TYP, " +" LOT_USE2.SUPPLIED_ISSUE_QTY_SUM, " +" LOT_USE.SUPPLIED_ISSUE_QTY " +"FROM " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT LOT_USE, " +" T_ISSUE_INST ISSUE_INST, " +" M_ITEM ITEM, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" LOT_USE1.ITEM_CD, " +" MAX(LOT_USE1.LOT_NO) AS LOT_NO, " +" SUM(LOT_USE1.SUPPLIED_ISSUE_QTY) AS SUPPLIED_ISSUE_QTY_SUM " +" FROM " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT LOT_USE1, " +" T_ISSUE_INST ISSUE_INST1 " +" WHERE " +" LOT_USE1.ITEM_CD = ISSUE_INST1.ITEM_CD " +" AND LOT_USE1.ISSUE_INST_CD = ISSUE_INST1.ISSUE_INST_CD " +" AND LOT_USE1.WORK_ODR_CD = ? " +" AND ISSUE_INST1.WORK_ODR_CD = ? " +" AND ISSUE_INST1.ISSUE_TYP IN (1, 2) " +" GROUP BY " +" LOT_USE1.ITEM_CD " +" ) LOT_USE2 " +"WHERE " +" LOT_USE.ITEM_CD = ISSUE_INST.ITEM_CD " +" AND LOT_USE.ISSUE_INST_CD = ISSUE_INST.ISSUE_INST_CD " +" AND LOT_USE.ITEM_CD = LOT_USE2.ITEM_CD " +" AND LOT_USE.LOT_NO = LOT_USE2.LOT_NO " +" AND LOT_USE.ITEM_CD = ITEM.ITEM_CD " +" AND LOT_USE.WORK_ODR_CD = ? " +" AND ISSUE_INST.WORK_ODR_CD = ? " +" AND ISSUE_INST.ISSUE_TYP IN (1, 2)"
"UPDATE " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT " +"SET " +" \\"SUPPLIED_ISSUE_QTY\\" = ? " +"WHERE " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT.\\"RSLT_CTL_SEQ_NO\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" COUNT(1) " +"FROM " +" M_ITEM, " +" M_WH, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT.LOT_NO, " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT.ITEM_CD, " +" SUM(T_LOT_USE_RSLT.TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY) AS TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY, " +" SUM(T_LOT_USE_RSLT.SUPPLIED_ISSUE_QTY) AS SUPPLIED_ISSUE_QTY " +" FROM " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT " +" WHERE " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT.WORK_ODR_CD = ? " +" GROUP BY " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT.LOT_NO, " +" T_LOT_USE_RSLT.ITEM_CD " +" ) LOT_USE_RSLT, " +" T_ISSUE_INST " +"WHERE " +" T_ISSUE_INST.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD " +" AND T_ISSUE_INST.WH_CD = M_WH.WH_CD " +" AND T_ISSUE_INST.ITEM_CD = LOT_USE_RSLT.ITEM_CD(+) " +" AND T_ISSUE_INST.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_ISSUE_INST.\\"ISSUE_TYP\\" IN ('1', '2') " +" AND ROWNUM <= NVL(TO_NUMBER(?), ROWNUM) + 1"

"update " +" t_lot_trace " +"set " +" FROM_PUCH_ODR_CD = ?, " +" TO_PUCH_ODR_CD = ? " +"where " +" from_item_cd = ? " +" and from_lot_no = ? " +" and to_item_cd = ? " +" and to_lot_no = ? " +" and lot_trace_typ = 3"
"SELECT " +" T_ACPT_RSLT.PUCH_ODR_CD " +"FROM " +" T_ACPT_RSLT " +"WHERE " +" T_ACPT_RSLT.ITEM_CD = ? " +" AND T_ACPT_RSLT.LOT_NO = ? " +"ORDER BY " +" PUCH_ODR_CD DESC, " +" ACPT_NO DESC"
